page.title: 06EVENTS
page.content: The most popular event in the Curbridge/Curdridge area is the Curdridge Show. It includes side stalls, competitions, sales and business men trying to sell their goods. Two to three events are held each year. Sometimes people go to events to ask for jobs. Many people go to the event and a lot of money is made. Daffodil Day held at Fairthorne Manor is a fun day where people go to see flowers and the grounds. A helicopter is also there. {HOUSING} The cost of a semi-detached house varies from Â£35000-Â£40000. A detached house with 3 to 4 bedrooms and a large garden costs about Â£70000. A house is usually sold between 5 and 6 weeks as the area is very popular.
